Class DataBase

java.lang.Object

public class DataBase
extends java.lang.Object
Class that represents the DataSet's initialization.

    • addApi

      public void addApi​(Image image)
      Method that add an image to the collection of API_Instragram.
      Parameters:
      image - The image that the user wants to add to the collection.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - if the image is existing in the collection yet.
      See Also:
      Image, API_Instagram

    • deleteApi

      public boolean deleteApi​(java.lang.String id)
      Method that deletes an image or an album of the API_Instragram's collection.
      Parameters:
      id - Identify the photos.
      Returns:
      true or false if the image is found and deleted.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - if the image or the album is not present in the API.
      See Also:
      API_Instagram

    • addApi

      Method that add an album to the collection of API_Instragram.
      Parameters:
      album - that the user wants to add to the collection.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - if the Album is existing yet.
      See Also:

    • filterservice

      public FilterService filterservice​(java.lang.String json) throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException, java.lang.NumberFormatException, FilterNotFoundException
      Method that manage the call of filter by using jolly character.
      Parameters:
      json - String of a JsonObject
      Returns:
      a FilterService
      Throws:
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - Error that is thrown if there is any problem on the conversion of a string into an object.
      FilterNotFoundException - It is thrown when the filter doesn't exists.
      java.lang.NumberFormatException - It is thrown when the format of number isn't correct.
      See Also:
      FilterService

    • SearchPhotos

      public Photos SearchPhotos​(java.lang.String id) throws FilterNotFoundException
      Method that search a photo in the collection of API_Instagram by using an id passed by the user.
      Parameters:
      id - Identify the photo to search.
      Returns:
      a Photo.
      Throws:
      FilterNotFoundException - It is thrown when the filter doesn't exists.
      See Also:
      Photos, API_Instagram, Album, Image

    • getStatisticsFilter

      public StatisticService getStatisticsFilter() throws StatsNotFoundException
      Method that gives back the statistics of filtered images.
      Returns:
      StatisticService.
      Throws:
      StatsNotFoundException - It is thrown when the statistic doesn't exists.
